title: Doris Leuthard “My life as a Federal Councillor and President of Switzerland” – CWF Official Website

quotes: DORIS LEUTHARD, former President of the Swiss Confederation 2010 and 2017 – Swiss Federal Councillor, 2006-2018.
DORIS LEUTHARD, former President of the Swiss Confederation 2010 and 2017 – Swiss Federal Councillor, 2006-2018.
In her capacity as minister, she was appointed by United Nations Secretary General António Guterras in 2018 to the High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation, co-chaired by Melinda Gates and Jack Ma.

organizations.name: BSCC – British Swiss Chamber of Commerce
quotes: The BSCC – British Swiss Chamber of Commerce – is inviting the CWF members and their guests to share a special luncheon, featuring DORIS LEUTHARD, former President of the Swiss Confederation 2010 and 2017 – Swiss Federal Councillor, 2006-2018.

quotes: Doris Leuthard “My life as a Federal Councillor and President of Switzerland” – CWF Official Website

organizations.name: Christian Democratic People’s Party (CVP/PDC)
quotes: Coming from the Christian Democratic People’s Party (CVP/PDC), she was first elected to the Swiss Federal Council in 2006 and stepped down in 2018.

organizations.name: Swiss Federal Council
quotes: Coming from the Christian Democratic People’s Party (CVP/PDC), she was first elected to the Swiss Federal Council in 2006 and stepped down in 2018.

organizations.name: Federal Department of Economic Affairs
quotes: In high office, she headed the Federal Department of Economic Affairs and then went on to become head of the Federal Department of Environment, Transport, Energy and Communications.

organizations.name: Federal Department of Environment, Transport, Energy and Communications
quotes: In high office, she headed the Federal Department of Economic Affairs and then went on to become head of the Federal Department of Environment, Transport, Energy and Communications.

organizations.name: High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation
quotes: In her capacity as minister, she was appointed by United Nations Secretary General António Guterras in 2018 to the High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation, co-chaired by Melinda Gates and Jack Ma.

organizations.name: Kofi Annan Foundation
quotes: Nowadays, she is a member of various boards, including the Kofi Annan Foundation and Stadler Rail.
